description: A complete lookup table mapping every specific product function from routines.json to a general product composition profile for percentage analysis.

Hydrating Cream Cleanser.notes: Gentle cleanser with higher emollient content for dry/sensitive skin.

Gentle Foaming Cleanser.notes: Water-based with significant surfactants for normal to oily skin.

Oil-based Cleanser.notes: Primarily oils and emulsifiers to dissolve makeup and sebum.

Gentle Foaming or Clarifying Cleanser.notes: Profiled as a foaming cleanser. The 'clarifying' aspect relates to actives, not the base.

Gentle Foaming or Enzyme Cleanser.notes: Profiled as a foaming cleanser. The 'enzyme' aspect relates to actives, not the base.

Hydrating Toner.notes: General profile for all toners. Very high water content.

Soothing Toner.notes: General profile for all toners. Very high water content.

Hydrating or Clarifying Toner.notes: General profile for all toners. Very high water content.

Soothing or Gentle Exfoliating Toner.notes: General profile for all toners. Very high water content.

Hydrating Essence.notes: Slightly more viscous than a toner, with a higher concentration of humectants and actives.

Brightening Essence.notes: Slightly more viscous than a toner, with a higher concentration of humectants and actives.

Barrier Support Essence.notes: Slightly more viscous than a toner, with a higher concentration of humectants and actives.

Calming Essence.notes: Slightly more viscous than a toner, with a higher concentration of humectants and actives.

Hydrating Essence or Weekly Exfoliant.notes: Primary profile is an essence. The 'exfoliant' part refers to the active ingredients.

Hydrating Serum.notes: General profile for most water-based serums.

Anti-aging Serum.notes: General profile for most water-based serums.

Pigmentation Serum.notes: General profile for most water-based serums.

Barrier Repair Serum.notes: General serum profile, may contain slightly more lipids.

Refining Serum.notes: General profile for most water-based serums.

pH-Balancing Serum.notes: General profile for most water-based serums.

Lightweight Moisturizer.notes: For lotions and light creams, higher water content.

Barrier Repair Moisturizer.notes: For rich creams, higher oil and occlusive content.

Anti-aging Moisturizer.notes: For rich creams, higher oil and occlusive content.

Lightweight Barrier Repair Moisturizer.notes: For lotions and light creams, higher water content.

Hydrating Mask or Oil.notes: Profiled as a wash-off mask. Algorithm should check for Face Oil profile if oil content is >90%.

Anti-aging Mask or Oil.notes: Profiled as a wash-off mask. Algorithm should check for Face Oil profile if oil content is >90%.

Soothing Mask or Oil.notes: Profiled as a wash-off mask. Algorithm should check for Face Oil profile if oil content is >90%.

Clay Mask.notes: Base is a mix of water/glycerin and absorbent powders.

Eye Cream.notes: A rich emulsion formulated for the delicate eye area.

SPF 30+.notes: Cream/lotion chassis with a significant percentage of UV filters.

Lip Balm.notes: Almost entirely composed of waxes, oils, and butters.
